section.title: Disable Instant Messenger Client (Yahoo!)
section.para: Disables the Yahoo!® instant messenger client. If the “ymessenger” package is installed, this module will remove all permissions from /usr/bin/ymessenger so it cannot be used.
If an instant messenger is needed, configure your network to restrict with whom end-users can communicate. If this client is not needed, remove the package.
